question: Question
rules: We are visiting an unknown destination, a city in the world. Your job is to figure out where we are heading! You will hear a number of clues worth 10p, 8p, 6p, 4p, and 2p. There is timer at the top and you must answer within the given time. Drag the emergency brake and submit your answer! When the destination is revealed, you will need to answer two questions related to it. One correct answer gives 1 point, two correct answers gives 3 points. The player with the most points at the end of the game wins!
participateDescription: Retrieve the game code from the game master and enter it here to jump into the game!
waitingForHost: Waiting for host to start game...
headline: Where are we going?
mustName: You must enter a response before you can lock it!
